mapper.select: SELECT R.REPLY_ID, R.CONTENT, R.CREATED_AT, R.UPDATED_AT ,R.DEPT, R.ORDER_NUMBER, R.TOP_REPLY_ID, R.MEMBER_ID, M.NICKNAME FROM REPLY R, MEMBER M WHERE R.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID AND BOARD_ID = #{boardId} START WITH TOP_REPLY_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR REPLY_ID = TOP_REPLY_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY R.ORDER_NUMBER
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET CONTENT = #{content}, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE REPLY_ID = #{replyId}
